ShortDescription.Value: Super fast building and unlimited demand.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Infinite Demand This mod will force buildings to be built almost instantly. Additionally, you can enable fast leveling to increase their levels quicker.
This mod also allows you to adjust building demand to your desired level. Depending on your simulation speed, the demand sliders may take a while to increase. Using the sliders instead of Ultimate Demand may work less efficiently.
## Notice This mod does not fill houses with citizens. It will cause rapid building, but they will become abandoned if no one moves in. I recommend using the Abandoned Building Remover Mod in addition to this one to help deal with the abandoned buildings.
## Features ### Super Fast Build and Ultimate Demand The game will build all property types almost instantly. All other demand settings are ignored when this is enabled.
### Fast Leveling Enable this to increase the level of the buildings at a faster rate.
### Sliders For Each Property Type You can adjust the demand for each property type (Residential, Commerical, Office, and Industrial) individually on a scale of 0-100.
### Disable Demand Override For Each Property Type You turn off the override for each property type (Residential, Commerical, Office, and Industrial) and allow the game to calculate the demand as normal.
### Reset Settings Use the reset button to reset all of the mods settings to default.
### Compatability and Removal You can remove the mod at any time, and your save games should not be affected; the normal demand levels will be restored as determined by the game. This mod should not have any compatibility issues with other mods.
### Languages For loading languages other than English please utilize I18n Everywhere. Thank you to Baka-gourd and the team of translators helping make mods more accessible!
## Contact Please use the discussion forum if you have any questions.
